com.sun.media.jsdt.event

Interface RegistryListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RegistryAdaptor

    public interface RegistryListener
extends java.util.EventListener, java.io.Serializable
    The listener interface for receiving Registry events.
    Since:
    JSDT 2.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clientCreated(RegistryEvent event)
      invoked when a Client has been created.
      void clientDestroyed(RegistryEvent event)
      invoked when a Client has been destroyed.
      void connectionFailed(RegistryEvent event)
      invoked if a problem is detected with the connection to the Registry.
      void sessionCreated(RegistryEvent event)
      invoked when a Session has been created.
      void sessionDestroyed(RegistryEvent event)
      invoked when a Session has been destroyed.

        void sessionCreated(RegistryEvent event)
        invoked when a Session has been created.

      • connectionFailed

        void connectionFailed(RegistryEvent event)
        invoked if a problem is detected with the connection to the Registry.

        This listener is automatically removed as a listener on the connection that reported the failure, to prevent continual failure notifications.

        Parameters:
        event - the Registry event containing more information.
